activities: Square, Inc. (“Square”) provides a website and applications to make commerce easy for sellers and sellers’ customers by providing services such as a mobile point of sale, delivery of digital receipts, payment processing, and related online business services. Square receives, processes, and uses personal information from the EU/EEA and Switzerland for the purposes of (i) providing, improving, and marketing these services; (ii) complying with governmental, legislative and regulatory bodies; and (iii) protecting the interests of Square and Square’s users.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
